action.content:
You are participating in a collaborative guessing game.
The goal is to find out whether this grid and another picture only I can see, are the same.
Please describe your grid first. Then, I will provide my description and we can ask each other questions about the grids to figure out whether they are the same. Each of us can ask 3 questions. Now start your short grid description with "DESCRIPTION:" followed by the description. Do not add anything else. This is your grid:

Now ask a question in order to find out new aspects of my grid that may be different to your grid. Start with "QUESTION:" and do not add anything else.
QUESTION: Is there a vertical line of squares that are all the same color in your grid?

ANSWER: Yes

Now ask a question in order to find out new aspects of my grid that may be different to your grid. Start with "QUESTION:" and do not add anything else.
QUESTION: Are there any squares in your grid that are not part of a horizontal or vertical line of the same color?

QUESTION: Are there any squares in your grid that are not part of a diagonal line of the same color?

Now ask a question in order to find out new aspects of my grid that may be different to your grid. Start with "QUESTION:" and do not add anything else.
QUESTION: Is there a square in your grid that is not part of any line of the same color?

ANSWER: Yes
QUESTION: Is there a square in your grid that is not part of any line of the same color? Start your answer with "ANSWER:" and do not add anything else.

Now come to a decision. What do you think: are your grid and the other grid described the same?  Write "DECISION: same grid" if you think they are the same grid or "DECISION: different grids" if you think they are different grids. Do not add anything else.
